Two Dimensional Box and Whisker Plots

To install the development version of the package, use the `remotes` package:

```{r, eval=FALSE}
remotes::install_github('jbryer/ggBoxplot2d')
```

Basic example using the `mtcars` dataset.

```{r}
library(ggBoxplot2d)

```
